data.Name: Knocked Loose
data.Bio: Knocked Loose is an American metalcore band from Oldham County, Kentucky, formed in 2013 and currently signed to Pure Noise Records. The band is Bryan Garris (lead vocals), Cole Crutchfield (rhythm guitar & backing vocals), Isaac Hale (lead guitar & backing vocals), Kevin Otten (bass), and Kevin Kaine (drums). The band released their first studio album, Laugh Tracks, on September 16, 2016, and followup, A Different Shade of Blue, on August 23, 2019, both through Pure Noise Records. Read more on Last.fm
